author: Chua Lee Ming J:
casenumber: General Division of the High Court — Admiralty in Rem No 206 of 2020 (Registrar’s Appeal No 323 of 2020); Admiralty in Rem No 207 of 2020 (Registrar’s Appeal No 324 of 2020); Admiralty in Rem No 208 of 2020 (Registrar’s Appeal No 325 of 2020)
counsel: Bazul Ashhab, Prakaash Silvam and Tan Yu Hang (Oon & Bazul LLP) for the appellant; Timothy Tan, Edwin Cai and Tay Rui Lin (AsiaLegal LLC) for the respondent.

headings.text: Whether the stay should be conditional on the time-bar waiver
Batavia’s failure to commence arbitration before its claims became time-barred
Batavia did not show very special circumstances
